metadata.title: CVE-2021-23368 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
The package postcss from 7.0.0 and before 8.2.10 are vulnerable to RegularExpression Denial of Service (ReDoS) during source map parsing.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-23368` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-postcss - 8.4.16+~cs8.0.23-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-postcss package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.4.16+~cs8.0.23-1').
